product.title: Pluto the Detective | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Pluto the Detective

In this thrilling page-turner, Mickey Mouse and Pluto unite as a dynamic investigative duo in pursuit of jewel robbers. Young readers are sure to delight in this tale of mystery and intrigue, as they hunt for clues and help Mickey and Pluto discover the jewel caper.

Tie-in Activity: Hide one of your child’s toys, and then design a treasure map or leave a series of clues for him to follow to find it. For added fun, provide him with a magnifying glass and an oversized detective hat.
